name: BacteriaCausingEncephalitisTestsForBacteriaCausingEncephalitisInUnspecifiedSpecimenByCultureAndIdentification
title: Bacteria [Causing Encephalitis] (Tests for Bacteria Causing Encephalitis in Unspecified Specimen by Culture and Identification)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Encephalitis-causing bacteria by culture and identification tests),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Encephalitis-causing bacteria by culture and identification tests),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
